name: Cascina Spinasse
comment: Cascina Spinasse offers a delightful Italian dining experience. Their handmade pasta dishes are a true treat for pasta enthusiasts, and the cozy atmosphere adds to the overall charm of the place.

name: The Pink Door
servcies: Proof of vaccination required, Delivery, Takeout
comment: The Pink Door is a hidden gem with a vibrant atmosphere and delicious Italian cuisine. The live entertainment, such as burlesque shows, adds an extra element of excitement to the dining experience.

name: Ba Bar
comment: Ba Bar is a fantastic Vietnamese restaurant that offers a modern twist on traditional dishes. Their pho and banh mi sandwiches are particularly outstanding, and the trendy ambiance adds to the overall appeal.

name: Shaker + Spear
comment: Shaker + Spear is a seafood lover's paradise. Their fresh and flavorful seafood dishes are beautifully presented, and the stylish and upscale setting makes it a perfect choice for a special occasion.

name: Biang Biang Noodles
servcies: Live wait time: 0 mins, Outdoor dining, Delivery, Takeout
comment: Biang Biang Noodles serves up authentic and satisfying Chinese noodles. The hand-pulled noodles are wonderfully chewy, and the bold flavors of their dishes make for a memorable culinary experience.

name: Spice Waala
comment: Spice Waala offers a delightful taste of Indian street food. The aromatic spices and flavorful dishes they serve provide a true explosion of taste, making it a popular spot for spice enthusiasts.

name: Marination Ma Kai
comment: Marination Ma Kai is a Hawaiian-Korean fusion gem. Their menu features a delightful blend of flavors, and the stunning waterfront views enhance the overall dining experience.

name: Katsu-ya Seattle
comment: Katsu-ya Seattle is a sushi lover's dream. Their sushi rolls are expertly prepared, with fresh ingredients and a perfect balance of flavors. The attentive service and elegant atmosphere complete the experience.

name: Kizuki Ramen & Izakaya
comment: Kizuki Ramen & Izakaya is a must-visit for ramen enthusiasts. Their authentic and flavorful ramen bowls are comforting and satisfying, and the izakaya-style dishes are also worth exploring.

name: Tacos Chukis
comment: Tacos Chukis is a casual taqueria that serves up mouthwatering tacos. The flavorful fillings and homemade tortillas create a true fiesta of flavors, making it a go-to spot for taco lovers.

name: Mr. West Cafe Bar
comment: Mr. West Cafe Bar is a trendy and cozy cafe that offers excellent coffee and delicious brunch options. The menu is creative and innovative, with dishes that cater to a variety of tastes.

name: Cafe Flora
comment: Cafe Flora is a charming vegetarian and vegan restaurant that showcases creative and flavorful plant-based dishes. The fresh ingredients and cozy atmosphere make it a delightful choice for vegetarians and non-vegetarians alike.

name: Zig Zag Cafe
comment: Zig Zag Cafe is a classic cocktail bar with a speakeasy vibe. The skilled mixologists craft unique and expertly balanced cocktails that will impress any cocktail enthusiast.

name: Pomodoro
servcies: Proof of vaccination required, Delivery, Takeout
comment: Pomodoro is an Italian trattoria that offers a warm and inviting ambiance. Their pasta dishes are cooked to perfection, and the friendly staff creates a welcoming atmosphere for a satisfying meal.

name: Meet Korean BBQ
comment: Meet Korean BBQ offers an interactive and delicious dining experience. The opportunity to grill high-quality meats at your table creates a fun and flavorful adventure, perfect for groups or a unique date night.

name: Piroshky Piroshky
comment: Piroshky Piroshky is a beloved Seattle bakery that specializes in Russian pastries. The aroma of freshly baked goods fills the air, and their flaky, savory, and sweet piroshky are simply irresistible.

name: Biscuit Bitch
comment: Biscuit Bitch is a quirky and popular spot for indulgent Southern-style breakfast and brunch. Their hearty biscuit sandwiches are packed with flavor and make for a satisfying comfort food experience.

name: AQUA by El Gaucho
comment: AQUA by El Gaucho is an upscale waterfront steakhouse known for its prime cuts of meat and impeccable service. The elegant setting and stunning views make it a perfect choice for a special occasion or romantic dinner.

name: Daniel’s Broiler
comment: Daniel's Broiler is a renowned steakhouse that offers top-quality cuts of meat. The elegant atmosphere and impeccable service create a sophisticated dining experience that is perfect for steak enthusiasts.

name: Sisters And Brothers
comment: Sisters And Brothers is a fantastic spot for delicious fried chicken. Their crispy and flavorful chicken, paired with a variety of creative sauces, make for a finger-licking good meal.

name: Dead Line
category: Latin American, Cocktail Bars, Venues & Event Spaces
servcies: Proof of vaccination required, Delivery, Takeout
comment: Dead Line is a trendy and vibrant restaurant with a unique atmosphere. The menu features a fusion of flavors and culinary styles, creating an exciting dining experience for adventurous food lovers.

name: Eden Hill Restaurant
comment: Eden Hill Restaurant offers a fine dining experience with a focus on inventive and artistic dishes. The chef's attention to detail and the exquisite presentation of each dish make it a standout destination for food enthusiasts.

name: 19 GOLD
servcies: Live wait time: 0 mins, Outdoor dining, Delivery, Takeout
comment: 19 GOLD is a stylish and upscale restaurant that showcases refined cuisine. The menu features a blend of international flavors and locally sourced ingredients, resulting in a culinary journey of sophistication and taste.

name: Xi’an Noodles
comment: Xi'an Noodles serves up authentic and flavorful Chinese noodles. Their hand-pulled noodles and aromatic sauces create a delightful combination that will transport your taste buds to the streets of Xi'an.

name: Morfire
comment: Morfire offers a memorable dining experience with their Thai cuisine. The dishes are packed with bold flavors and aromatic spices, providing a true taste of Thailand in a modern and inviting setting.
